com.snakybo.torch.camera

Class CameraInternal

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.snakybo.torch.camera.CameraInternal

  • public final class CameraInternal
extends java.lang.Object

    The camera used internally by the engine, all Cameras internally have a CameraInternal and are just a relay for the methods here.

    You most likely don't have a need to use this class, instead use the provided Camera component.

    Since:
    1.0
    See Also:
    Camera
